casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 1, 2010

[Cite as 02/01/2010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-335.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2001-0524. State v. Brown.

Mahoning App. No. 96 C.A. 56. This cause came on for further consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution and supplemental motion for stay of execution scheduled for February 4, 2010. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court that the motions for stay of execution are denied.
